summary: This is a brief email from a detective at the NYPD regarding a complaint about Mark Epstein, referencing case number 2020-001-2753. It appears to be a communication about scheduling and coordination for an investigation or follow-up.

keyFacts: The document references an NYPD complaint filed against Mark Epstein in 2020 (case number 2020-001-2753).
The communication originates from a detective at the NYPD's 16 Ericsson Place location in New York City.
The email is dated June 25, 2020, indicating ongoing law enforcement interest in matters related to the Epstein family.
